## Ingredients

* 1 cup peanut butter
* 3/4 cup white sugar
* 1 egg

## Directions

* Mix together ingredients.
* Roll into balls on a baking sheet.
* Flatten with a fork.

* Bake at 350F for 10 minutes.

Source: [Allrecipes](https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/244614/3-ingredient-peanut-butter-cookies/)
